newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian castor futures fall on speculative selling.
newsitem.headline: Indian castor futures fall on speculative selling.

text.p: Castorseed June delivery fell further by 11 rupees to 1,129 rupees per quintal on Friday on speculative selling, triggered by improved arrivals, traders said. It fell by two rupees on Thursday.
"Speculative selling dominated the trading," said a floor operator. "There were no export enquiries to prop the market."
In edible oils, groundnut oil was quoted at 372 rupees per 10 kg, one rupee above the previous close. In Rajkot, it lost two rupees to 568 rupees per 15 kg.
Palm oil was traded at 294 rupees per 10 kg, two rupees higher than the previous close.
